resources.string: Switch Essentials Needs To Forward Application Notifications To Remote Smart Devices. Press\"Confirm\"Enter Notification Page To Activate.
Permission Failed, Can Not Turn On Camera Function
Permission Failed，Will Not Be Able To Search The Device List
Permission Failed, Unable To Turn On SMS Notifications

Thank you for trusting and using Switch Essentials. 

 We will help you to understand our collection, use and storage of your personal information and your relevant rights according to the User Privacy Agreement. 

 When you use the Switch Essentials app, we will collect your device information, personal information (avatar, nickname, height, weight, exercise data) and other information. We need to get your camera permissions, photo album permissions to upload your app avatar: 

 When you use the Switch Essentials application to run outdoors, upload, share and store exercise information, we need to obtain your location permissions and other purposes to record your running track. 

 You can access, modify, delete your personal information or manage your authorization in the relevant pages. 

 We use industry-leading security technology to protect your personal information. 

 When you click "OK", you agree to the terms of this Agreement.
